description:
These eco-friendly, technical socks are double-layered to reduce friction as you move. Great for hiking and other long days on your feet.

  • Both layers are made of Repreve® polyester, nylon and LYCRA
  • Repreve® polyester is made from plastic bottles retrieved from waterways
  • Inner layer is smooth against the skin and wicks moisture away from your feet
  • Stabilizer zones keep them in place
  • Venting channels add breathability
name: WrightSock ECO Explore Crew Socks - Unisex
